== bioCancer - Interactive Multi-Assay Cancer Genomics Data Visualization ==
=== Author ===
<nowiki>[[http://bioinformatics.tn/|Karim Mezhoud]]</nowiki>

Nuclear Safety Department , National Center for Nuclear Sciences and Technologies, Sidi Thabet, Tunis, 2020, Tunisia

Email: kmezhoud(at)gmail.com

=== Description ===
bioCancer is a platform-independent browser-based interface for Cancer Genomics Data analytic in R, based on the Shiny package. 
bioCancer is hosted at http://46.101.227.144:3838/bioCancer/
